items.title: Notre Dame fans unite over Chris Ash
items.summary: Even with the survey closed, Notre Dame football fans are still blowing up my inbox with thoughts and feelings about Irish defensive coordinator, Chris Ash, and his current employment status with the program. 71% of Notre Dame fans surveyed, said the Irish should fire Chris Ash — but in what way? Admittedly, the question I […]

items.title: #22 Notre Dame Fighting Irish VS Arkansas Razorbacks: Staff Picks
items.summary: The Notre Dame Fighting Irish head south to SEC country to take on the Arkansas Razorbacks in Fayettville. It really is PLAYOFF FOOTBALL for the Irish as one more loss this season will knock them out of the race for the 12 team tournament. So… it’s basically last year — right? Not exactly, but this […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football: Arkansas Razorbacks Q&A with Whole Hog Sports
items.summary: Folks, I hope you were all able to breathe a sigh of relief after the Notre Dame Fighting Irish football team finally managed to secure a W last weekend in their 56-30 victory at home against the Purdue Boilermakers. I would have said a “huge” sigh of relief, but the defense still looked questionable, and […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football Recruiting: 4-Star Wisconsin DL Richie Flanigan commits to the Irish
items.summary: On Thursday, 4-Star defensive lineman Richie Flanigan gave his public commitment to Marcus Freeman and the 2027 Notre Dame Football recruiting class. The 6’3” 270 pound defensive lineman from Notre Dame Academy in Green Bay, Wisconsin, is the brother of current Notre Dame tight end James Flanigan, and visited during the Texas A&M game. Flanigan […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football: Should the Irish fire defensive coordinator, Chris Ash?
items.summary: Welcome to SB Nation Reacts, a survey of fans across the NCAA. Throughout the year we ask questions of the most plugged-in Notre Dame fans and fans across the country. Sign up here to participate in the weekly emailed surveys. It doesn’t take three games. It doesn’t even take one game. The fan uprising over […]

items.title: Lou Holtz, From Razorback Red to Irish Green
items.summary: This Saturday marks history—the first time ever that Notre Dame and Arkansas will meet on the football field. With no prior game to revisit, it’s the perfect chance to reflect on one legendary coach who forever links the two programs: Lou Holtz. Holtz took over the Arkansas Razorbacks in 1977, leading the program through seven […]
